• Main Page
  • Modules
Functions

01300_GetAllPropertiesWithEnumerator
[GP_010_Properties]

Functions

 TestCase_GC001_AllNames ()
 TestCase_GC002_AsBool ()
 TestCase_GC003_AsU32 ()
 TestCase_GC004_AsUUID ()
 TestCase_GC005_AsIdentity ()
 TestCase_GC006_AsBinaryBlock ()
 TestCase_GC007_AsString ()

Detailed Description

Description:
: Access properties with an enumerator.

Pre: Open a session to a GPTA.

Post: Close session and check that it succeeds.

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC001_AllNames (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05040000000000000000000000000001 6b28a6d436fe5fb9b5ed59cba151a0fc
Pre Conditions:
05040000000000000000000000000001.[drbin/tlbin] is loaded.
Focus:
Iterate through the list of all property names.
Test Steps:
Allocate a property enumerator with TEE_AllocatePropertyEnumerator() for TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION Call TEE_GetPropertyName() before starting the enumerator, should return TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND. Call TEE_StartPropertyEnumerator() to start enumeration while (TEE_GetPropertyName(length=0) != TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND):
  • call TEE_GetPropertyName() with 0 for buffer length to get the size of the required buffer
  • allocate a buffer for the name
  • call TEE_GetPropertyName() to retrieve the name, which should return TEE_SUCCESS, verify that the name is not empty
  • call TEE_GetNextProperty() After the end of the loop, call TEE_GetPropertyName() and verify that it returns TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND Free the enumerator with TEE_FreePropertyEnumerator()
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.01300_GetAllPropertiesWithEnumerator.GC001_AllNames
TestCase_GC002_AsBool (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05040000000000000000000000000001 6b28a6d436fe5fb9b5ed59cba151a0fc
Pre Conditions:
05040000000000000000000000000001.[drbin/tlbin] is loaded.
Focus:
Iterate through the list of all property names.
Test Steps:
Allocate a property enumerator with TEE_AllocatePropertyEnumerator() for TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA Call TEE_StartPropertyEnumerator() to start enumeration while (TEE_GetPropertyAsBool() != TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND):
  • call TEE_GetPropertyAsBool() using the enumerator and NULL for the name. The result may be TEE_SUCCESS, TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT, or TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND.
  • call TEE_GetPropertyAsBool() using the enumerator and an arbitrary name. The result should match that of the previous step.
  • call TEE_GetNextProperty() After the end of the loop, call TEE_GetPropertyAsBool() and verify that it returns TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND Free the enumerator with TEE_FreePropertyEnumerator() Verify that at least one item was sucessfully retrieved with a result of TEE_SUCCESS. Verify that at least one item was not successfully converted with a result of TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT.
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.01300_GetAllPropertiesWithEnumerator.GC002_AsBool

  • call TEE_GetPropertyAsU32() using the enumerator and NULL for the name. The result may be TEE_SUCCESS, TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT, or TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND.
  • call TEE_GetPropertyAsU32() using the enumerator and an arbitrary name. The result should match that of the previous step.
  • call TEE_GetNextProperty() After the end of the loop, call TEE_GetPropertyAsU32() and verify that it returns TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND Free the enumerator with TEE_FreePropertyEnumerator() Verify that at least one item was sucessfully retrieved with a result of TEE_SUCCESS. TestCase_GC005_AsIdentity (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05040000000000000000000000000001 6b28a6d436fe5fb9b5ed59cba151a0fc
Pre Conditions:
05040000000000000000000000000001.[drbin/tlbin] is loaded.
Focus:
Iterate through the list of all property names.
Test Steps:
Allocate a property enumerator with TEE_AllocatePropertyEnumerator() for TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT Call TEE_StartPropertyEnumerator() to start enumeration while (TEE_GetPropertyAsIdentity() != TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND):
  • call TEE_GetPropertyAsIdentity() using the enumerator and NULL for the name. The result may be TEE_SUCCESS, TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT, or TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND.
  • call TEE_GetPropertyAsIdentity() using the enumerator and an arbitrary name. The result should match that of the previous step.
  • call TEE_GetNextProperty() After the end of the loop, call TEE_GetPropertyAsIdentity() and verify that it returns TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND Free the enumerator with TEE_FreePropertyEnumerator() Verify that at least one item was sucessfully retrieved with a result of TEE_SUCCESS.

TestCase_GC006_AsBinaryBlock (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05040000000000000000000000000001 6b28a6d436fe5fb9b5ed59cba151a0fc
Pre Conditions:
05040000000000000000000000000001.[drbin/tlbin] is loaded.
Focus:
Iterate through the list of all property names.
Test Steps:
Allocate a property enumerator with TEE_AllocatePropertyEnumerator() for TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION Call TEE_StartPropertyEnumerator() to start enumeration while (TEE_GetPropertyAsBinaryBlock() != TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND):
  • call TEE_GetPropertyAsBinaryBlock() with 0 for length. The result may be TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER, TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT, or TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND.
  • If the result is TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER, allocate a new buffer and call TEE_GetPropertyAsBinaryBlock() using the enumerator and NULL for the name. The result may be TEE_SUCCESS, TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT, or TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND.
  • If the result is TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER, allocate a new buffer and call TEE_GetPropertyAsBinaryBlock() using the enumerator and an arbitrary name. The result should match that of the previous step.
  • call TEE_GetNextProperty() After the end of the loop, call TEE_GetPropertyAsBinaryBlock() and verify that it returns TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND Free the enumerator with TEE_FreePropertyEnumerator() Verify that at least one item was sucessfully retrieved with a result of TEE_SUCCESS. Verify that at least one item was not successfully converted with a result of TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT.
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No

400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.01300_GetAllPropertiesWithEnumerator.GC006_AsBinaryBlock
TestCase_GC007_AsString (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05040000000000000000000000000001 6b28a6d436fe5fb9b5ed59cba151a0fc
Pre Conditions:
05040000000000000000000000000001.[drbin/tlbin] is loaded.
Focus:
Iterate through the list of all property names.
Test Steps:
Allocate a property enumerator with TEE_AllocatePropertyEnumerator() for TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION Call TEE_StartPropertyEnumerator() to start enumeration while (TEE_GetPropertyAsString() != TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND):
  • call TEE_GetPropertyAsString() with 0 for length. The result may be TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER, or TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND.
  • If the result is TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER, allocate a new buffer and call TEE_GetPropertyAsString() using the enumerator and NULL for the name. The result may be TEE_SUCCESS, or TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND.
  • If the result is TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER, allocate a new buffer and call TEE_GetPropertyAsString() using the enumerator and an arbitrary name. The result should match that of the previous step.
  • call TEE_GetNextProperty() After the end of the loop, call TEE_GetPropertyAsString() and verify that it returns TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND Free the enumerator with TEE_FreePropertyEnumerator() Verify that at least one item was sucessfully retrieved with a result of TEE_SUCCESS. Verify that at least one item was not successfully converted with a result of TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT. The result should never be TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT for TEE_GetPropertyAsString().
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No

400A

GP_010_Properties.01300_GetAllPropertiesWithEnumerator.GC007_AsString
